mapper.select: SELECT film_t.UUID AS filmId, film_t.film_name AS filmName, film_info_t.film_en_name AS filmEnName, film_t.img_address AS imgAddress, film_t.film_score AS score, film_info_t.film_score_num AS scoreNum, film_t.film_box_office AS totalBox, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(show_name SEPARATOR ',') FROM cat_dict_t WHERE FIND_IN_SET( cat_dict_t.UUID, (SELECT REPLACE(TRIM(BOTH '#' FROM film_cats),'#',',') FROM film_t t WHERE t.UUID = film_t.UUID) )) AS info01, CONCAT((SELECT show_name FROM source_dict_t WHERE source_dict_t.UUID = film_t.film_source),' / ',film_info_t.`film_length`,'分钟') AS info02, CONCAT(film_t.`film_time`,' ',(SELECT show_name FROM source_dict_t WHERE source_dict_t.UUID = film_t.film_source),'上映') AS info03 FROM film_t, film_info_t WHERE film_t.UUID = film_info_t.film_id AND film_t.UUID = #{uuid}
